issue.title: Can we get rid of libraries/openlayers/ and use the last version packaged ?
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Can we get rid of libraries/openlayers/ and use the last version packaged (libraries/OpenLayers-2.13.1/)?

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

~388 files and ~6.5MB economy...

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Oh, and there's a bonus version in com_easysdi_service !

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Oh... same question for proj4js-1.4.1 : unused

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

A clean up is necessary : unused libraries must be remove, and only one version of used libraries must be kept.

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Closed by #1218, thanks to Thomas

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Hi Hélène,

This has been resolved by : https://forge.easysdi.org/issues/1218.
Do we close or reject and put content in the other issue ?

Thanks
